title.rendered: Mamata takes out rally seeking ‘justice’ for wrestlers in Kolkata

content.rendered:
Mamata Banerjee, the West Bengal chief minister and leader of the TMC, held a demonstration in Kolkata on Wednesday to express her outrage over the alleged abuse of wrestlers in Delhi.

Read Also: Ravindra Jadeja gifts his IPL 2023 final bat to teammate Ajay Mandal, he shares pic

There is a video online of Mamata holding a sign that reads, “We Want Justice.” As she led the demonstration in support of the wrestlers, she remarked, “We are with you in your fight.”
